body:
This thread is for talking about your skin!
I've seen tons of interesting skins around the server, I wanted to know about them :D

  • Why do you have the skin you have?
  • Did you make it yourself?
  • Where'd you get it if you didn't make it?
  • Do you plan to change it when 1.8 comes out?

Example:
  • It's basically kind of what I look like in real life, what I wear, and some components from past skins of mine.
  • Yes, I made it in preparation for 1.8. When it comes out I will have more layers and such :p
  • I made it
  • Nope, I'm happy with it the way it is.


If this has been done before please lock

replies.body:
Why do you have the skin you have?
Because I needed to make a derp skin to match my friends.
Did you make it yourself?
I didn't make the blue part. I found a blue skin, put some green over it, and then the derp face.
Do you plan to change it when 1.8 comes out?
Possibly, but probably not right away.

replies.body:
• Why do you have the skin you have?
  • Because I wanted a skin that matched my ign.
  • Did you make it yourself?
  • Nah. I made an original but it was so shit I vomited. I have 0 talent when it comes to art.
  • Where'd you get it if you didn't make it?
  • Evocal made it for me. Thanks to him many people think my skin is good.
  • Do you plan to change it when 1.8 comes out?
  • Never. I hate people who change their skin often.

replies.body:
Why do you have the skin you have?
I made this skin  while ago as a "PVP skin". It was a temporary skin but now that I have a new computer and haven't got my old skins currently on this computer, I'm stuck with this one, which is fine because I've always liked this skin. 
Did you make it yourself?
Every skin I have every made has been original. 
Where'd you get it if you didn't make it?
N/A
Do you plan to change it when 1.8 comes out?
Yes, I have made a handful of skins since I started Minecraft, I plan to make a skin that merges them all together to form one "Super skin" if you will.

This skin isn't supposed to resemble anything and is completely random if you were wondering.

And there you go :)

N/A
Do you plan to change it when 1.8 comes out?
Yes, I have made a handful of skins since I started Minecraft, I plan to make a skin that merges them all together to form one "Super skin" if you will.

This skin isn't supposed to resemble anything and is completely random if you were wondering.

And there you go :)

replies.body: My skin is me. Legit, so close. I'm even wearing the bear onesie as I type. I chose it for this reason, plus #OnesieRevolution. I edited a skin with my old one, then added the onesie. I plan to make the onesie 3D in 1.8.

replies.body:
• Why do you have the skin you have? I found a website on the old forums to add a new layer to your skin. Evocal made the skin inside the onesie, and I experimented and added this onesie layer. I liked it and I kinda kept it until I used novaskin to make wallpapers. My skin would always glitch and turn parts of the teeth black. So I changed the skin, and I messed it up terribly so I had to add a different onesie. 
  • Did you make it yourself? No
  • Where'd you get it if you didn't make it? Evocal and a website
  • Do you plan to change it when 1.8 comes out? No
replies.body_tagged:
• Why do you have the skin you have? I found a website on the old forums to add a new layer to your skin. Evocal made the skin inside the onesie, and I experimented and added this onesie layer. I liked it and I kinda kept it until I used novaskin to make wallpapers. My skin would always glitch and turn parts of the teeth black. So I changed the skin, and I messed it up terribly so I had to add a different onesie. 
  • Did you make it yourself? No
  • Where'd you get it if you didn't make it? Evocal and a website
  • Do you plan to change it when 1.8 comes out? No

replies.body:
My skin has gone through a lot of changes, all are custom made by me. My first skin was a Priest shrouded in gold with a wide smile and a golden tooth. He was a priest of the Toastism religion, centered around the wonderful wonders of toasted bread, and he had a piece of bread on his back. I had him for a long time, and only recently changed it this year, before I joined Avicus, to my adventurer, and even more recently, like last month, I changed it to this Constable skin, for a roleplay server I belong to. All have kept the same smile and golden tooth :)


  • So, atm my skin is a constable for a roleplay server
  • Yes I did make it myself
  • I will probably change back to my priest cuz I miss it.
